content.text: Berserker
Frontline bruiser. Close distance, hit hard, take hits. Abilities focus on aggression, resilience, threat generation, and making enemies deal with you.
T1 — Baseline (Free)
Aggressive Stance (Passive): When you move toward an enemy and attack in the same turn, your first attack gets +1 accuracy.
T2 — Pick from (300 cr each)
Bloodlust (Passive): When you drop an enemy to 0 HP, your next attack this turn costs 1 less AP (minimum 1). Chain kills reward aggression.
Taunt (Active, 1 AP): An enemy within Close range has -2 accuracy against anyone except you until your next turn. You make yourself the target.
Brace (Passive): If you don’t move on your turn, gain +1 Armor until your next turn. Holding ground has value.
Menacing Presence (Passive): Enemies within Close range have -1 to checks to resist Intimidation effects from any source. Your proximity is unsettling.
Shrug It Off (Passive): Once per encounter, when you take damage from a single attack, reduce it by your Grit bonus (after armor). You absorb the hit.
Momentum Charge (Passive): If you spend 2+ AP on movement before attacking, your first melee attack gets +2 damage (flat, applied after armor). Running start hits harder.
T3 — Pick from (600 cr each)
Reckless Swing (Passive): Declare any melee attack Reckless before rolling. +2 accuracy, but enemies get +2 accuracy against you until your next turn.
War Cry (Active, 2 AP): All allies within Close range get +1 accuracy on their next attack. All enemies within Close range must target you if able until your next turn.
Unbreakable (Passive): First time you drop to 0 HP in an encounter, drop to 1 HP instead. Once per encounter.
Cleave (Passive): When your melee attack drops an enemy to 0 HP, you may immediately make a free attack (0 AP) against a different enemy within Close range, at -2 accuracy. Once per turn.
Thick Skin (Passive): Reduce the duration of all conditions on you by 1 turn (minimum 1). Poison, Bleed, Stun, Hex all tick down faster. Your body fights off everything.
Ground Slam (Active, 2 AP): All enemies within Close range make a Grit check (DC 7) or are knocked Prone. No damage. Pure crowd control. Once per encounter.
Retribution (Passive): When an enemy hits you with a melee attack, your next melee attack against that enemy gets +1 accuracy and +1 damage per die. You remember who hurt you.
T4 — Pick from (1,000 cr each)
Frenzy (Passive): While below 50% HP, all your attacks cost 1 less AP (minimum 1). More dangerous wounded.
Immovable (Passive): Cannot be moved against your will. Immune to Prone from enemy attacks. Cannot be grappled.
Last Stand (Passive): While at 25% HP or below, gain +2 Armor and +2 accuracy. You become hardest to kill at the moment everyone expects you to fall.

Executioner (Passive): Your attacks against enemies below 25% HP automatically crit (double damage dice). No accuracy roll needed for the crit — if you hit, it’s a crit. Finishing blows are guaranteed devastating.
